column4: hm, this would be much easier if I ran my livecd... how do I boot into it, I tried to earlier, but it ignored the cd, I have bios to boot from cd first
how do I make my computer boot to cd? I start it up and it skips the cd and just loads my installed ubuntu
does it tell about any keys that you can press?
if everything goes too fast, try pressing the Pause key
